mapper.select: select num, idx, writer, content, ref, re_level, re_step, reg_date, delete_yn from (select rownum as rank, num, idx, writer, content, ref, re_level, re_step, reg_date, delete_yn from (select num, idx, writer, content, ref, re_level, re_step, reg_date, delete_yn from products_comments order by ref desc, re_step asc )) where idx = #{idx}
mapper.insert: insert into products_comments(num, idx, writer, content, ref, re_level, re_step, reg_date, delete_yn) values(pcmt_seq.nextval, #{idx}, #{writer}, #{content}, pcmt_seq.currval, 0, 0, sysdate, 'N')

insert into products_comments(num, idx, writer, content, ref, re_level, re_step, reg_date, delete_yn) values(pcmt_seq.nextval, #{idx}, #{writer}, #{content}, #{ref}, #{relevel}, #{restep}, sysdate, 'N')
